name: Integration
description: An assimilated version of Voyager appears on the outskirts of the Alpha Quadrant, and its presence causes distrust of the Borg to heat up once more. Find out who's behind the assimilated ship and stop it from doing damage--physical or political.
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Augment, Section 31, or Borg Faction Missions in one Phase, and Ship Battles in another Phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Esmar, T'Pol, Seven, Garak, or crew with the Borg trait will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Faction Missions.
-- Using the Assimilated Voyager, Borg Sphere 878, or Romulan Valdore-type Warbird will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Every Ship Battle or Faction Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Esmar, T'Pol, Seven, Garak, or Borg
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: T'Ana
featured_crew.flavor: T'Ana and Shaxs roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

action.name: Hands Up Where I Can See Them!

featured_crew.name: Seven
featured_crew.flavor: When Annika Hansen was assimilated with her family, she became the Borg drone Seven of Nine.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Borg Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

rewards.name: Seven
rewards.flavor: After being severed from the Borg Collective, Seven of Nine--now called Seven--struggled to adapt.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Assimilated Voyager
ship.flavor: After an attack from a Species 8472 vessel, the Borg Cube defends the Voyager. Janeway agrees to a temporary alliance with the Borg, beginning with the Voyager's assimilation.

ship.name: Borg Sphere 878
ship.flavor: Commandeered by General Kotok and other rebel Borg members of Unimatrix Zero in 2377.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: When Annika Hansen was assimilated with her family, she became the Borg drone Seven of Nine.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: T'Ana
rewards.flavor: T'Ana and Shaxs roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

goals.flavor: Handle the rogue drones' tech with the Augments.
Find out who's behind this with Section 31.
Maintain the new alliance with the Borg.
